description: Another sibling of the Foltor family, the Foltor Sentinel has also been designed from ground up for the sole use by the Argon Military. As the newest addition to its class, the Foltor Sentinel features energy weapons only, but no missiles. Many regard this as a design flaw, while actually, the trade-off in total mass provides for better acceleration and attitude control than otherwise would have been possible.
name: Foltor Sentinel
